content.question: In the psychosocial theory of development, which of the following best illustrates his notion of the struggle between intimacy and isolation?

choices.label: Jose is worried that they will not be successful in college and therefore will not get into medical school.
Bobbi wants to establish a foundation to provide scholarships to students at her college for the next 25 years.
Nisha just graduated from college and is worried about balancing their new career and a committed relationship.
Spencer does not trust any of his teachers because he is convinced that none of them think he is a good student.

content.answer: Nisha just graduated from college and is worried about balancing their new career and a committed relationship.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
